channel.title: Voyage Century Online - just as tedious as RS but better
channel.description: Mine, Farm, Kill, ITS LIKE PIRATE NINJA HEAVEN there are several good ups and downs in VCO the first up is that where you see you can go sea wise, the mass expanse of this games interactive open ended philosophy is what keeps me playing, i am still pretty noob. Graphics are pretty stellar and they aren't heavy like some MMORPG's who will remain nameless. Bitching nautical destruction at its finest for those who want hack slash with economy and a little twist this game is right up your alley. Honestly I've played too much junk to recommend it. [img]http://alkaspace.com/usr/2537/yes2.JPG[/img] [img]http://alkaspace.com/usr/2537/whoa.JPG[/img]

item.title: Voyage Century Online - just as tedious as RS but better
item.dc:creator: @hog hog
item.description:
@hog wrote:

As soon as you enter voyage century online dot com, even before you click Enter site at the bottom left theres a direct client download as well as a bittorrent download so download that. Create an account, wait for your client to download and patch and boom should work fine, any problems you may experience should be answered by the FAQ or post on the forum of VCO.com

Read full topic

item.description:
@hog wrote:

http://www.voyagecenturyonline.com/
Yeah I got creamed last night. Have fun - if you do end up playing add Totallywow I think I’m getting the hang of the game and if you need help the site has skill guides and its own forum which is why theres no VCO forums by private people.

item.source: Voyage Century Online - just as tedious as RS but better

item.title: Voyage Century Online - just as tedious as RS but better
item.dc:creator: @hog hog
item.description:
@hog wrote:

Yeah you do need to dl it to your computer, but most of us have evolved from 486DX2/66, 16MB RAM, 445MB IDE disks and ps2 keyboards. Pesonally I will take being able to let your character mine/task what ever by itself because this game is like that, get cool stuff from a company that actually knows what their doing and get an enjoyable time for a little bit of lost space and rs anyday. runescape is good with a members account but even then its overwhelmed by all the stupid that comes with the game.
VCO has its flaws don’t get me wrong, but nice alternative to simple hum durm of normal games, I’ll grab some cool battle screens.

Read full topic
